revised_title: Royal Society Anniversary Meeting and Newton Tercentenary Celebrations: Honoring Fallen Fellows
tldr: The author, Sir Henry Dale, presents the Royal Society's Anniversary Meeting and Newton Tercentenary Celebrations, honoring the lives and achievements of those who passed away since the last meeting. The article highlights the contributions of notable scientists such as Emile Picard, Tullio Levi-Civita, and Sir William Henry Bragg, among others, in various fields of mathematics, physics, and chemistry.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific History
